description:
Momo Minamoto is a high school girl living an ordinary life in Sorasaki City – until she is recruited to join a private information agency called “Tsukikage”.

As it turns out, Tsukikage is actually a spy organization whose mission is to protect the peace and preserve justice from behind the scenes. The girls use secret tools and use specially created spices which enhance their abilities. Through Tsukikage’s mentoring system, the girls not only grow stronger, but closer. Together, they train their hearts and minds as weapons to fight against evil.

The metropolis of Sorasaki is being infiltrated by a criminal organization called “Mouryo”. Momo must work together with her friends to protect her family, friends and local residents against Mouryo’s evil forces.

(Source: Pony Canyon USA)
synonyms: リリース ザ スパイス

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Espionage
tags.description: Prominently features characters infiltrating an organization in order to steal sensitive information.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

node.description:
__Birthplace:__ Takaoka, Toyama Prefecture, Japan
__Residence:__ Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_namori_/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/124923) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/namoridane/)

Namori is a manga artist, best known for the manga [Yuru Yuri](https://anilist.co/manga/41593/Yuru-Yuri). She started attending painting classes around the age of 3 and she likes to work on her manga in coffee shops and other places outside. 

When she went to school, one of her classmates wrote "na" (the Hiragana "な") in a cute way, and Namori wanted to write it as well, hence her pen name starts with "na". The "mori" part does not stem from anywhere in particular.

He founded the adult game brand [Minato Soft](http://minatosoft.com/t4p/) in 2006.

[Website](http://www.takahiro.ms/index.htm) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takahiro4p)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/imozuka) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%9F%B3%E9%87%8E%E8%81%A1)

Satoshi Ishino is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor, character/mechanical designer and animation director.

He started working at Studio Giants, but later went to work at Studio Fantasia before becoming a freelance animator. Today he is a part of the animator group Studio Hercules (スタジオへらくれす), and he's also a part of the doujin circle TEAM Imozuka (TEAM いもずか).

Satoshi is best known for his work as a character designer and animation supervisor in the show Excel Saga and the related Puni Puni Poemi.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akirasato_)

__Height:__ 162 cm (5'4")
